import IGlueStackCreatesPluginInstance from "@gluestack/framework/types/plugin/interface/IGlueStackCreatesPluginInstance";
//@ts-ignore
import packageJSON from "../package.json";

//Do not edit the name of this class
export class MyGlueStackPlugin implements IGlueStackCreatesPluginInstance {
  app: any = null;

  constructor(app: any) {
    this.app = app;
  }

  getName(): string {
    return packageJSON.name;
  }

  getVersion(): string {
    return packageJSON.version;
  }

  runBootstrap() {
    console.log(`Booting ${this.getName()}...`);
  }

  getTemplateFolderPath(): string {
    return `${process.cwd()}/node_modules/${this.getName()}/template`;
  }

  async runPostInstall(target: string) {
    return await this.app.createPluginInstance(
      this.getTemplateFolderPath(),
      target,
    );
  }
}
